item.title: Pickled Onions
item.description: Boil 1 cup of rice-wine vinegar and 1/2 cup of sugar in a pot Turn off the heat Add 1 sliced red onion to the pot, stirring occasionally until the pot cools Refrigerate the onions in a mason jar

item.title: Roasted Vegetables
item.description: Heat oven to 425Â°F Spread vegetables on a baking sheet Cover them with olive oil Salt to taste Bake for 15 minutes or until they crisp to taste Turn off oven and let vegetables rest until eaten
